text: The 50th World Rowing Junior Championships were the 50th edition and were held from 24 to 28 August 2016 at the Willem-Alexander Baan in Rotterdam, Netherlands in conjunction with the World Rowing Championships and the World Rowing U23 Championships. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |JM1x | Armandas Kelmelis || 07:09.72 | Anton Finger || 07:13.25 | Lucas Ferreira || 07:15.90 |-
